marklogic.body:
I'm only 26 ... but my "aging" has been very subtle. When I look at pictures of myself when I was 18 there is a big difference, but I can't see the differences from 18-19 and so on. I no longer have a "baby face" but I haven't gone gray or anything. I work out and shave more now than I did in my early 20s so I actually look better.
My parents are another story. At 50 my dad has has started to gray, bloat and wrinkle ... while my mom - despite some minor weight Gain - looks exactly the same as she did in her late 30s.
